item.title: Karthigai Deepam & Swami Malai Celebration
item.description: Thiru Karthigai (weekday) - Tue, Dec. 10th 9:30am ..... Subramanya Homam 10am ....... Paalkudam & Kaavadi 10:30am .... Murugan Abishekam 6pm ........ Annamalayar Deepam 7:30pm ..... Palani Andavar Abishekam Karthigai Deepam & Swami Malai Celebration (weekend) - Sat, Dec. 14th 10:30am... Paalkudam & Kavadi 11am........ Murugan Abishekam, Bhajan & Deeparadhanai ========================================================================== SPONSORSHIP DETAILS ========================================================================== Archanai .
